Translations.Text: When ona bore him ona izolovat faraway miesto
Narodenie process pojdem ju kufor palm strom Ona said (ja bol ashamed;) Ja zelat si ja bol dead before this happened completely zabudnut
infant vola sa ju ju saying nie rmutit sa! Tvoj Lord zadovazit ona stream
Ona shake kufor z this palm strom it pustit zrely datum ona
Jestn pne bol happy When ona see ktokolvek say â€˜ja robit vow zahriaknut; ja nie talking dnes ktokolvek
Ona pojdem ju rodina beriem him. They said O Mary ona committed nieco bol totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tvoj otca nie bol zly clovek nor bol tvoj matka unchaste
Ona pointed him. They said Ako my talk s infant crib
infant spoke said ja bol servant GOD He dat mi scripture appointed mna prophet
He robit mna zehnat wherever ja ist enjoined mna observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat) mat rad long mat rad ja zivy
Ja je honor moj matka He nie robit mna disobedient rebel
peace je mi dni ja bol born dni ja umrel dni ja get resurrected
Je Jesus syn Mary this bol truth this zalezitost kto they zotrvat doubt
It nie befit GOD ze He begets syn He glorified Do have anything robit He len says do Bol it bol
He i proclaimed GOD bol moj Lord tvoj Lord ona kult Him alone This je na pravo chodnicek
(various parties disputed themselves zretel identita Jesus). Therefore woe do those disbelieve zrak hrozny dni
Cakat do ona hear them see them when they pojdem face us! transgressors ze dni totally lost
Warn them dni remorse when judgment issued They je totally oblivious; they nie verit
My je the jeden zdedit zem everyone it us everyone spatny listok
Zmierit Sa scripture Abraham; he bol saint prophet
He said do jeho otca O moj otca ona kult co mozem neither hear nor see nor pomoc ona v any way
O moj otca ja received certain znalost ze ona nie receive nasledovat mna ja guide ona straight chodnicek
O moj otca nie kult devil devil rebelled against the Vela Gracious
O moj otca ja fear lest ona incur retribution z the Vela Gracious potom become ally devil
He said ona forsaken moj gods O Abraham? Ona zastavit ja stone ona. vlavo mna
He said Peace bol ona. Ja implore moj Lord forgive ona; He bol Laskavy mna
Ja zhyraly ona gods ona kult GOD Ja kult len moj Lord By imploring moj Lord alone ja nie ist zlo
he zhyraly them gods they kult GOD my granted him Isaac Jacob my robit each z them prophet
My lejak them our zlutovanie my granted them honorable position history
Zmierit Sa scripture Moses He devoted he bol posol prophet
My vola sa him riadne strana Mount Sinai. My brought him confer him
A my granted him our zlutovanie jeho brat Aaron prophet
Zmierit Sa scripture Ismail! He bol truthful when he robit promise he bol posol prophet
He pouzivat enjoin jeho rodina observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) zavazny laska k bliznemu (Zakat;) he bol acceptable do jeho Lord
Zmierit Sa scripture Idris! He bol saint prophet
My chov him honorable rank

These bol some z prophets koho GOD zehnat They zvolit si descendants Adam descendants z those my beriem Noah descendants z Abraham Izrael z those my guided selected When revelations the Vela Gracious som recited them they jesen prostrate weeping
